website_summaries.verdict: One of the best ways to add DVD functionality, navigation, and voice control to older vehicles with a single stereo.
pros: Rotating screen folds up to stay out of the way when not in use
Comes with many handy apps such as music and radio control
cons: Screen resolution is not as high as other infotainment screens near the same price point

customer_reviews.title: Big, sharp, beautiful picture with all the features you want....
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my 1996 Ford Bronco and LOVE IT! I connect my Google Pixel to this and display Waze for my daily trips. My sister bought a new Honda CRV and she can't even do this! My boys love that they can watch their favorite videos when we are on long trips. The screen is big, bright and sharp. Oh, I also have a backup camera hooked to this and can back up to attach the boat the first time, every time. The 1080P HD camera shows so crisp and clear. Get this for your older vehicle and save $$ from buying a new car.
customer_reviews.author: Teal S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for the value. Got for my 07 Lincoln. Looks and sounds really good! Back up camera is great quality as well. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could see the display in day time

customer_reviews.text: The radio is a very good stero/ CD/DVDplayer. However, the parking brake bypass for the DVDplayer is somewhat of a pain. Nevertheless, YouTube has all the information needed to bypass the parking brake. VERY GOOD RADIO

Still learning all the features. Overall very satisfied with purchase and delivery time. Would buy again from this seller.

The radio is a definite must have I have fallen in love

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with this head unit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great head unit. I mounted a backup camera in my 2005 Dodge Ram without issue. It switches to the camera as soon as I put my truck in reverse (This requires connecting the correct wire under the hood to the head unit). I can connect 3 devices and easily switch between them. If you install the Pioneer apps, it will automatically launch Pandora on your phone when you turn your head unit on.

customer_reviews.title: awesome features and sound
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described, very fast shipping, Unit performs flawlessly, awesome features and sound, 100% satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband for Christmas from Best Buy, but returned it because it was much ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas from Best Buy, but returned it because it was much less here on Amazon. My husband has an older classic pickup truck, but really missed having a modern radio and he absolutely loves this product and has no complaints.

customer_reviews.text: Not sure if other are having this issue, but there are quite a few software issues. Randomly doesn't let me change the volume. The screen will act as if its frozen but you can hear the beep of the buttons being pressed. Flickering of the screen between one into the other. Seems to happen very often, as I have only have the stereo installed about a week.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Had it professionally installed in my motorhome. Much more user friendly that any other radio that I have tried (especially for a senior citizen). The bluetooth works well with iPhone and for connecting other devices. Easy to use for wife and me and the grandkids enjoy all the features. Also had XM installed with it and that works very well. Instructions for set up and use are well written and easy to follow. The power output for the speakers was much higher and better than the radio it replaced.

customer_reviews.text: i bought this in december and just had it sitting on my room floor so i decided to install it in my car 2 days ago and when it was installed it isnt taking no disc and the display button on the radio isnt working and only sames like the volume button is working on the remote controll this unit is garbage so it lookslike my $340 was a waste

customer_reviews.title: Packs more punch than older Pioneer head unit!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 02 Dodge Dakota. It had an existing Pioneer head unit purchased through BestBuy. I bought the 7800BT for its GPS capability. What I was surprised to find after the install was the amazing power to drive my speakers. I have 6 1/2" Inifnity Kappas all the way around in this little truck. I had planned on running two separate amps: one for the speakers and one for a sub. But after installing the head unit i've determined that the factory power coming out of this head unit is plenty and sounds amazing. Absolutely love this new head unit!
customer_reviews.author: john r.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect single DIN unit with lots of toys.
customer_reviews.text: I love this head unit! Installed in a 1994 E350 RV for phone, tunes, subscription music on the road, and backup camera. It all works perfectly. The bluetooth compatibility surprised me at how easily it connects to my iPhone 7. People can even hear me over the noise of a big diesel engine on the microphone.

customer_reviews.title: For those stuck with single DIN, the closest you'll ...
customer_reviews.text: For those stuck with single DIN, the closest you'll get to a double DIN experience. Make sure you have a strong grasp of wiring as the installation is not as straightforward as the double DINs, and the mechanics may require some basic repair work, but the item is worth it. Also, monitor works perfectly well inline with a rear/forward camera system that I had lying around. I have not yet had the maintenance issues that others have pointed out, though my purchase is still fresh.
customer_reviews.author: I enjoy sandwiches

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing stereo unit
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing stereo unit, love the built in Spodify and Pandora apps. I had a flip up radio previously, but now I can control those apps from the radio instead of having to mess with the phone while driving. The mic that comes with this provides crystal clear audio and does well to minimize background noise. There are a plethora of great features including an extremely bright screen (easy to see even in direct sunlight), vertical and horizontal screen adjustments, the tuner is fantastic, has camera backup input, rear video output, bluetooth, and even navigation support with RadioOneApp. It is a deep radio so make sure you have enough dash space before installation. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Lookabill

customer_reviews.title: This head unit is the best I've owned and I've been messing with car audio ...
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is the best I've owned and I've been messing with car audio and competition audio for 20+ years

The software is good, but as with all these systems there is only a minimal amount of customization. The settings are quite extensive which is great to have.

customer_reviews.text: The unit works great. However, the installation recommendations should advise anyone installing on an early 2000's Suburban, Tahoe or Silverado that the gear shifter will be in the way when the shifter is in park. Beware. Also it is a touchscreen on a flip up unit, so be gentle when using the touchscreen features.

He installed it all by himself (I was impressed) and loves the graphics. I don't usually get into this tech stuff but it is really cool! We sat in the truck and listened to music, oohing and ahhing :) Great product!

I expected a lot more for this flagship unit. Sound is great, screen is great. Also no removable plate. Again for this high end unit, I expected at least that.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great sterio but the range on the bluetooth is the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sterio but the range on the bluetooth is the worst I've ever had my phone has to be on top if the sterio for it to not cut out if it's in my pocket 2ft away it starts to cut out I had to buy a suction cup so my phone would sit right above it 3 inches away then it won't cut out I have a kenwood in my other truck and my phone can be 100 ft away and still not cut out
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow...not much else to say. I have installed possibly hundreds of car stereos in my lifetime and have all different brands and this one by far is top notch...the app radio works flawlessly with my galaxy note 5 through usb...love the google map integration. The bluetooth is amazing clarity and even shows song names on the head unit. Dvds are amazingly clear. Touch screen os perfect and the sound is again top notch...love all the customization possibilities with this unit. Good job pioneer and thanks amazon for getting it to me next day.

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it was low profile and easy to put in

product_meta.title: Pioneer AVH-210EX Double DIN Bluetooth in-Dash DVD/CD/AM/FM/Digital Media Car Stereo Receiver with Xtremevision HD Backup Camera
product_meta.description: The receiver is an entry-level in-dash multimedia a/v receiver designed to improve in-vehicle entertainment and connectivity with your smartphone. Enjoy features such as built-in Bluetooth AVRCP 1.6 for hands-free calling and audio streaming. Audio/video playback from USB and DVD sources and safety features such as back up camera ready and much more. Stay safe and obey local hands-free laws with built-in Bluetooth (HFP). Easily pair a Bluetooth enabled phone to the receiver without having to go through complicated settings. When a registered Bluetooth device is near the receiver, the auto connection function automatically pairs the two units. From wireless audio streaming (A2DP), hands-free calling, and simple pairing, to audio control and artist, album, and song search (AVRCP 1.6 profile*), Bluetooth wireless technology has made life in the vehicle much more convenient. Users of Android devices running operating system 4.0 or later can connect and listen to music stored on their device to the receiver without the need for an app. The process is made possible using Media Transfer Protocol (MTP). MTP allows the receiver to recognize the Android smartphone as a music storage device. Users can now access music via USB stored on an Android device and operate basic operations like FF, REW, Play, Pause, Random Play, and Repeat. Metadata information such as track, artist, and album name can be displayed. Pioneer's receiver is ready to roll with direct connectivity to your iPod or iPhone for music. Song, artist, time and album information are beautifully displayed on the 6.2" touchscreen. A USB connection provides direct digital signal transfer from the device for clean, clear sound while providing 1 amp of current to keep your iPod/iPhone charged. Back-up camera input enables you to add a reverse (rear facing) camera that can assist with rear visibility, towing, or parking. Select from among five colors (blue/red/amber/green/violet) for the display and 112 different colors to match unit illumination to your vehicle's interior lighting. Also choose from several background images to suit your mood.
feature_bullets: Built-in Bluetooth, Hands-Free Profile (HFP), Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP), Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP), Secure Simple Pairing (SSP), Serial Port Profile (SSP), and Dual Phone Connection

Expandability: Single, Rear UBS Input, Rear AUX Input, Back-up Camera Input, Wired Remote Input, Composite Video Output, 1-3. 5mm (Audio/Video) Mini Jack AV Cable, and USB Direct Control for iPod/iPhone
Digital Media Playback: CD/CD-R/CD-RW Playback, DVD/CD/USB MP3/WMA/AAC/WAV Audio Playback, and DVD/DVD-R/DVD-RW MPEG-1/MPEG-2/MPEG-4/AVI/DIVX/WMV/JPEG Video Playback

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars179 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
